channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description:
I Opened my npcdrops.cfg i understand a bit of it but could someone explain the whole method?
[code]//general graardor npcdrop = 1115 35 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 2621 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1115 667 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 1077 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 746 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 2402 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 13664 1 1[/code]
i understand npcdrop = 1115 thats my monster id and then the next one is item id. could someone explain what the last 2 are? Thanks

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

npcdrop = MONSTER ID ITEM ID AMOUNT PERCENT_CHANCE

Read full topic
